ModMetaData.name: Rim of Madness - Biomes
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
V1.18.0.0 Adds strange and unnerving environments to RimWorld.
* Biomes * ------------ Haunted Forest -> Dark and foreboding. The haunted forest is a ghastly environment. If you have arachnophobia, vampires, cults, or the Lovecraft storyteller enabled, expect to encounter creatures appropriate for the area from those mods.
More to come...
